In Modern specifically, I think it has a lot to do with creatures that are at 3 toughness - that is, bolt targets. There are probably plenty of creatures that would massively playable if you just increased the toughness to 4.
EDIT: Playable is one thing, but the OP was asking what card would be banned. It's actually hard to think of cards which would for sure meet that requirement.

At this point, it would hurt the game too much. In times of great joy, people need something to complain about. Damnation is the hero we need....to not be reprinted.

The only thing that really bugged me was the drone camera that was constantly moving during the interviews. It didn't ruin the Pro Tour or anything but I just wonder if they did that to be fancy? Is it cheaper than having a camera man? On the subject of glare, maybe I don't know enough but can't they just do a test game to adjust lighting accordingly to minimize glare?
It did kind of have it all - Massive flavor wins, incredibly close games, top decks, and new decks that defied the current meta expectations.
The LSV game was great, but this game between Daniel Cathro and Owen Turtenwald...wow, WOW. Gameplay AND flavor.
No worries. You're just expressing an honest opinion, it's really just the timing of the comment isn't the greatest. I was really more commenting on other people not being AS honest as you.

Probably the most enjoyable match I've seen so far, although, I don't know how much of that is because the players are who they are.
EDIT - GREAT MATCH

While I didn't ever have a big problem with Randy and I don't necessarily condone your post, you are at least consistent in your opinion. I can't count how many times I've read people on here who scream "Get rid of Randy!!!". But in this situation these same people are afraid to go their because they will get downvoted to oblivion.

Ok, "completely off-flavor" is going too far. It is, after all, *literal* crop rotation. I'm not mad this exists, it's awesome and fun, these were just my first thoughts. Also, I'm biased as I think Crop Rotation is one of the biggest homerun's flavor-wise. Just based on the title and the function of the card, it's perfect - and that's before getting to the original flavor text.
My thought was, "This is completely off-flavor, but it's still pretty awesome."
You can pretty much translate any complaints post game to "I'm mad that I lost".

I don't know if anybody else was expecting this, but I thought when I right-clicked on the number amount for a specific card, it would reduce by one. That's what I would like, but I don't know if that's intuitive for other people. And it's not that big of a deal since you can change it later, but it would be nice.
